## Buggy Code:
```rust
fn get_somes(v: Vec<Option<i32>>) -> Vec<i32> { v.into_iter().filter(|x| x.is_some()).map(|x| x.unwrap()).collect() }
```

## Compiler Error:
clippy::manual_flatten: use .flatten() instead of filter+unwrap

## Fixed Code:
